MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Phillip Street, Walker Street, Tomkinson Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 5:49PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:55PM on Sunday 1st November 2020
